Title: Git: Using the Stash Command
Author: Corey Schafer
Project_desc: In this video, we will take a look at the git stash command. Git stash is extremely useful when you have some changes that you want to save but aren’t ready to make a commit.

Title: An in-depth look at Python’s package management system, pip
Author: Corey Schafer
Project_desc: In this video, we will take an in-depth look at Python’s package management system, pip. We’ll walk through how to install, uninstall, list, and upgrade packages. We will also dive into how we can output our dependencies and install a list of dependencies.

Title: Python: virtualenv and why you should use virtual environments
Author: Corey Schafer
Project_desc: In this video, we will be looking at virtualenv and why you should be using virtual environments in Python. Virtual Environments in Python allow us to keep project-specific dependencies in a separate place than our global site-packages. This is extremely useful when you have different versions of packages for different projects.

Title: Resize Multiple Images Using the Mac Terminal
Author: Corey Schafer
Project_desc: One problem I run into frequently is needing to resize multiple images at once. To do this manually would take way too much time, especially if you have a lot of images.

Author: Corey Schafer
Project_desc: One problem I run into frequently is needing to resize multiple images at once. To do this manually would take way too much time, especially if you have a lot of images.

Title: How to quickly create favicons for the desktop, Apple/Android devices, tablets, and more
Author: Corey Schafer
Project_desc: In this video, We will walk through the process of quickly creating favicons for your website or brand that look great almost any device using realfavicongenerator.net

Title: Sublime Text Quick Tip: “Go To Definition” Click Shortcut
Author: Corey Schafer
Project_desc: In this Sublime Text Quick Tip, we’re going to see how we connect a mouse shortcut to the “Go To Definition” command.

Title: Python: if __name__ == ‘__main__’
Author: Corey Schafer
Project_desc:
In this video, we will take a look at a common conditional statement in Python:

Title: JavaScript Arrays: Properties, Methods, and Manipulation
Author: Corey Schafer
Project_desc: In this series, we will take an in-depth look at JavaScript Arrays, their properties, their methods, ways we can manipulate their values, and much more.

Title: CSS Tips and Tricks: Add External URLs to Print Stylesheets
Author: Corey Schafer
Project_desc: Printing out URLs can be a nice edition to print stylesheets. When someone prints your article or blog post, you want them to know where your links would have taken them so that they can investigate those sources further if they desire.
